m_szDocSumamry: Report: Mercedes-Benz Will Release a Hydrogen Fuel Cell GLC Next Year ​Like Audi, Mercedes-Benz is making big bets on hydrogen and electric cars. E-mail Soon, Toyota and Honda won't be the only automakers to offer a hydrogen fuel cell vehicle to the public. Mercedes-Benz R&D chief Dr. Thomas Weber said that Mercedes will launch a fuel cell version of its GLC crossover next year, in an interview with  Autocar . Mercedes joins Audi, BMW and others in investing in both hydrogen and electric cars.
